Cheating Hurts

Girl is on the couch making out with a hot guy, her cellphone rings...

Girl:Hey babe, I'll be right back. I need to take this call.

Boy: Yeah okay. Sure.

She walks into the next room.

Girl: Hey! What's up?

Guy [on her cellphone]: Nothing, hey hun, do you think we could go do something later tonight? What are the chances my boss let me get out early.

Girl: Yeah, sounds great!

Guy [on her cellphone]: Okay. I'm right by your house, I'll come to get you now.

Girl: That's not such a good idea...

Guy [on her cellphone]: Why not?

Girl: I'm busy right now... sorry.

Guy [on her cellphone]: With what? It's our anniversary! You didn't make any other plans did you...?

In her head she yells, SHIT! Throws clothes back on quickly.
Girl: No No... I was just eating... with the family.

Guy [on her cellphone]: But I thought you said your family was away this weekend, up at your resort?

The guy walks into her house, turns the corner into the hallway. Goes downstairs, and finds his bestfriend on her couch, half un-dressed, trying to pull his pants back on and his girlfriend pulling her shirt over her head.

Guy: What the hell is going on?!

Girl: I can explain! Please listen to me!

Guy: Benny? How could you do this to me! Rachel! I thought you loved me! And yet, your sleeping with MY BEST FRIEND!!!!

Girl: John...!

John with tears in his eyes, he rushes out of room, and slams the door.

Benny climbs out of the window, starts his car, and drives off down the street.

Girl runs after her boyfriend. Yelling...

Girl: NOOOO! Please!! Come back John!! Pleeeeeasssse????!! She falls down and cries.

John turns around, looks straight at his girlfriend in tears.

John: Why? Rachel, why? I loved you! Oh my God, I'm in love with a whore. Does this mean I have to pay you now?!
Here take this as the cash. He drops a ring box on her lap.

She opens the ring box. Her jaw drops... Before her eyes is a diamond wedding ring.

Girl: You were going to propose?

Guy: Yeah... how dumb was I? And as he slowly walked back to his car, his headlights faded... And she was in despair.

Later that night, the girl got a phone call from the police saying he just jumped off the bridge and killed himself.

If you love/like someone, and you want them in your life forever. Repost in 380 seconds as "cheating hurts." Or your true love will walk away

7 word love note

One night a guy & a girl were driving home from the movies. The
girl sensed there was something wrong because of the painful
silence they shared between them that night. The guy pulled over and told the girl he wanted to talk. He told her that his feelings had changed & that it was time to move on. A silent tear slid down her cheek as she slowly reached into her pocket & passed him a folded note. At that moment, a drunk driver was speeding down that very same street. He swerved
right into the girls side, killing the girl. Miraculously, the guy survived. Remembering the note, he pulled it out & read it.
"With out your love, I would die."

this doesnt touch you because this is just wrong. read this. its disgusting

Walking in my nighty; rubbing my eyes
My fathers sitting on the sofa with his friend
He pats the seat in the middle; i sit
Shivering so cold; a quilt he lends

"Jessy you love me don't you" a smile; his
Their breathe spirts weep
"Daddy you know i do; what is it?"
He smiles at his friend; his hand creeps

His friend takes my hand; looks me in the eyes
Daddys creeping up my nightie; cold hands
I try to pull his hand away;
their grip is strong!
They look at one another; nod; something planned

I feel my palms sweat; Daddys under my knickers
"Daddy im going to bed! Night" Pulling again
But there grip is to strong for weak me
I look at both; and ask, who are these men?

His fingers going up me; pulling away
His friend leans forward; a kiss? Why?
His toungue moving mine; my eyes squint
Lean back and away; "Why are you doing this?"
No answer, i feel the pain inside me; him
Chucks the quilt on the floor; me to
I try and scamper away, but im not fast
"O Daddy please, i love you"

His friend; pulling at my nightie
And my Dad pulling my pants down
His friend pinning my hands to the floor
As my Dad lies himself on the ground

I squirm; as Daddy friend pulls me up
And places me ontop of Daddy; thrusts within
I cry; i bite; i scratch; i slap; i fail
"O Daddy please you win you win!"

I can feel my skin rip; my virginity breaking free
I can feel the blood seep down my leg
"Daddy your hurting me please"
I plead to him and his friend; not even a beg

Daddys laughing; why does he laugh?
His friend shoves himself in my mouth and moans
Tieing my hands together; moving in and out
"Ride me Jessy" He laughs and groans

They smile at one another; laugh to
They roll me over and spread me wide well
My daddy sits on my face; himself in again
While his friend talks and pushes himself inside

I can hardly breathe; i gag for air
I cough and splutter; cry and weep
I beg and plead; but its no use
Theyve already made me hurt and bleed

I stare into his eyes; that look upon me
This is not my Dad; where is he?
If he was still here; would he care
Would he actually even; see?

Finally they get of and lie me on the sofa
My cheeks blouchy from tears and pain
They play with them selfs; all over me
Rub it in; making me feel the shame

"Why Daddy? Please tell me why?"
Dad looks at his friend; and waves him away
"Jessy i love you" he smiles and kisses my cheek
"Is that all you have in your heart to say?"

He puts my nightie on me
he walks me to my bedroom door
Ever since that night; His friend
And himself every Friday come back for more

"Night sweet Girl; You are my life"
Closing the door, tears still down my face
Still the smell of him and his friend
Fade into me like disgrace

I watch the Moon go down; the sun come up
"Jessy its school" Knocking at my door
I cant help but cry; weep in pain
Because im so scared he wanted more

But one night daddy took it too far
Daddy and his friend came back for one last shot
They were worried they would get caught
So he and his friend took me to a cemetary lot

I was blindfolded and my hands were tied back
"Daddy please!! Not tonight!"
Daddy and his friend both had their last fun
After that i tried to put up a fight

I begged daddy "Please no more!"
All he could say "Shut up, you stupid Bitch!"
Daddy unblindfolded me at last
He said I love you so much

He went back into the car and pulled out a bat
"Daddy I swear I wont say a thing!!!!"
I was dead
After only one swing..........................

age shouldnt matter

David is a 10th grader who is best friends with Bobby

Sarah is an 8th grader who is Bobby's sister

Everyday David comes to Sarah's house to hang out with her brother, and Sarah likes David alot and David likes Sarah but he doesn't want anyone to know because she is an eighth grader. DO NOT IGNORE!!!!!!!

Friday:

David in is on the phone with Bobby, Sarah hears that David is coming over to watch the game. Sarah gets all dressed up for David.
2 minutes later
David comes in...

David- Yo Bobby, you home?!
Sarah- *smiling* Oh he's getting dressed
David- *smiles* Okay then I'll wait
Sarah- Umm do you want a drink?
David- Okay, but i don't want to bother u, I can get it
Sarah- Oh it's cool, I'll get it

Sarah walks slowly behind his back and smiles....few seconds later she comes out with the drink. Sarah accidently spills the drink on the floor, and almost falls. David grabs her by the waist before she could fall. They looked at eachother...

David- Are u okay?
Sarah- Yeah thanks...
David- Umm...so...
Sarah- I'll go get some more drinks
David- No, its okay... umm you can sit down if u want
Sarah- Okay-*quietly sits*
David- How is school...anyone u like?
Sarah- No...
David- Is it cool if i crash here tonight?
Sarah- Of course... why not
David- Is anyone else coming besides me
Sarah- Yeah, my cousin
David- Okay, I didn't want you to feel like the only girl
Sarah- *Nods and smiles*

7 minutes

A knock comes to her door... it was her cousin Nikki...Sarah jumps and whispers ''he's here'' they went to sit down and watched the game.... a few minutes later they got bored so Nikki went up to Sarah's room.

Nikki- So u really like David huh?
Sarah- Yeah, but i don't think he would like an eighth grader
Nikki- Well how'd you know?
Sarah- Ummm because he is a tenth grader
Nikki- Ask him.. just say do u like me?
Sarah- NO!!!! Are you crazy he might think im wierd

5 minutes

Bobby and David were downstairs watching the game. It was half time. They started talking about some guy stuff. Bobby saw what happened when his sister spilled the drink, he didn't want his best friend to date his sister. He saw Sarah and Nikki listening and peaking through the door crack. He smiled and began to talk, pretending he doesn't see them

Bobby- Do you like my sister?
David- NO! *nervous* c'mon man she's a...
Bobby- Yes, you do
David- NO! I said no already why don't u believe me
Bobby- Why don't you like her?
David- She's not my type and she's ugly
Bobby- Whoa! Okay ...

Bobby sees his sister like she is about to cry... then Bobby feels guilty. It was dinner time and Nikki ordered pizza. David looks at Sarah and smiles. Sarah looked the other way with her eyes about to water. David looked confused.

43 minutes

The pizza came. Bobby paid for the pizza and everyone took a slice exept for Sarah.

Nikki- Hey i thought you said you were hungry, why aren't you eating?!
Sarah- *nods slowly while looking down* Not hungry.
Bobby- C'mon Sarah eat... you know you want to.
Sarah- *Nods slowly*

8 minutes

Sarah walked to her room while everyone was eating.

Nikki- What's up with Sarah, she loves pizza.?
David- Is she mad?
Bobby- Iono... Nikki go talk to her
Nikki- Leave her alone she'll come down

37 minutes

The game starts and Sarah still hadn't came down. Bobby knows what he did was wrong.

Bobby- Aye yo David go talk to Sarah.
David- But she's mad
Bobby- *throws a pillow at him* Shut up, and try to make her come down.

David goes up nervously and knocks on the door. Sarah opens the door.

Sarah- What?

David- Uhmm the games starting, Wunna watch it?
Sarah- *rolls her eyes* No!

She closed the door.... David blocked the door from closing and goes into her room.

David- Look! Why are you acting like this?!!
Sarah- Like what?!
David- Your all mad! I- I- Its not you!
Sarah- Oh so I'm acting different?? I heard you talking with my brother okay!
David- Ohh...Well I didn't mean it
Sarah- Whatever! Just leave!
David- No! I won't leave until you're not mad at me anymore! Look Sarah i didn't mean what i said... the whole thing i said was the opposite of what i think of u!!
Sarah- Then why did u say it??!
David- I don't know why...
Sarah- Is it because I'm an eighth grader?
David- No... Yeah .... Look okay to tell you the truth i really like u. And i mean it!
Sarah- Well to tell YOU the truth so do I.

They both smiled. David looks at Sarah and she looks at him. They lean close to eachother and just started kissing.

* If you dont repost this your true love will hate u and move on!
* If you do your true love will kiss you whenever you'll see her/him.
